import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react' import { HiMenu } from 'react-icons/hi' import { AiFillCloseCircle } from 'react-icons/ai' import { Link, Route, Routes } from 'react-router-dom' import { Sidebar, UserProfile } from '../components' import { client } from '../client' import logo from '../assets/logo.png' import Snaps from './Snaps' const Home = () => { const [toggleSidebar, setToggleSidebar] = useState(false) return (
setToggleSidebar(false)} />
) } export default Home
